dct_description_sm: Gravé par Erhard Fres. 35 bis. Rue Denfert-Rochereau Paris ; Imp. Erhard Fres.
Verso includes various statistical, trade, communications, and historical information on various African countries, with 5 ancillary maps.
Shows possessions and protectorates by colonial powers, railroads, land routes, water ways, region names, islands, towns.
1898 latest year mentioned--presence of Orange Free State and South African Republic date this map to before 1902.
